sentences.en: His mouth started to jut out, and his jaw got longer.
sentences.cn: 他的嘴向前突出, 下巴也变长了.

sentences.en: His teeth tend to jut out a little.
sentences.cn: 他的牙齿长得有点儿凸出.

sentences.en: On the train, jut the head when Ni Keshi window.
sentences.cn: 火车上, 尼克时时把脑袋伸出窗外.

sentences.en: She was spared the watching of the branches jut out beyond the point of balance.
sentences.cn: 她幸免于看到将来枝干攲侧倾斜的景象.

sentences.en: Tall jagged rocks jutted out over the beach.
sentences.cn: 高耸嶙峋的岩石突兀于海滩之上。

sentences.en: The few landmasses that jut from the low clouds are covered with hostile jungle.
sentences.cn: 高出云层的陆地极少,而且大都被危机四伏的丛林所覆盖.

sentences.en: The rafters that jut out rot first.
The theology was complicated, despite the jut - jawed charm and aquiline intensity with which it was expressed.
sentences.cn: 尽管他有着极大的热情和非凡的敏锐,但神学本身对他来讲依然极其复杂.

trans.tran_en: something that juts out sticks out further than the other things around it
